so would this be right then? btw im really tired so im doing some crappy coding…=/

if(playerhasitem(ITEMID)){
if(objectID == 2807){
if(saraKills > 19){
toX = 2757;
toY = 9321;
saraKills -= 20;
sM(“The Saradomin kills drain from you…”);
//NpcDialogue = 163;
} else
sM("You need at least 20 Saradomin kills to fight Commander

Zilyana.");
} else
sM(“You need a rope to fight the commander”); <--------------added this
}
